for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    lst = set(map(int, input().split()))
    lst = list(lst)
    lst.sort()
    lst = lst[::-1]
    c = lst[0]
    b = lst[1]
    md = (b - c) % m
    if md < 0:
        md += m
    print(max(2 * c, c + b + md))

def solve(q, w, n):
    ann = 0
    p = max(q)
    for i in range(n):
        o = q[i]
        w1 = p + o + (p - o) % w
        w2 = p + o + (o - p) % w
        w3 = max(w1, w2)
        if w3 > ann:
            ann = w3
    return ann
f = int(input())
for _ in range(f):
    (e, w) = map(int, input().split())
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(solve(q, w, e))

for i in range(int(input())):
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    z = list(map(int, input().split()))
    t = max(z)
    s = []
    for l in range(0, len(z)):
        o = (t - z[l]) % y + t + z[l]
        p = (z[l] - t) % y + t + z[l]
        s.append(max(o, p))
    print(max(s))

def solve(q, w, n):
    an = 0
    p = max(q)
    for i in range(n):
        o = q[i]
        w1 = p + o + (p - o) % w
        w2 = p + o + (o - p) % w
        w3 = max(w1, w2)
        if w3 > an:
            an = w3
    return an

    (e, w) = map(int, input().split())
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(solve(q, w, e))

for i in range(int(input())):
    (N, M) = map(int, input().split())
    L1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    L2 = list(set(L1))
    L2.sort()
    D1 = max(L1)
    D2 = L2[-2]
    (X, Y) = (L1.index(D1), L1.index(D2))
    K1 = D1 + D2 + (D2 - D1) % M
    K2 = D1 + D2 + (D1 - D2) % M
    K3 = D1 + D1 + (D1 - D1) % M
    if K3 > K1 and K3 > K2:
        print(K3)
    elif K1 > K2:
        print(K1)
    else:
        print(K2)

        if z >= maxi:
            maxi = z
    max_ans = 0

        ans2 = i + maxi + (i - maxi) % M
        if ans1 >= max_ans:
            max_ans = ans1
        if ans2 >= max_ans:
            max_ans = ans2
    print(max_ans)

T = int(input())

def algo():
    (N, M) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    A = list(map(int, input().split(' ')[:N]))
    A.sort(reverse=True)
    i = 0
    p = 0
    q = 1
    out = A[p] + A[p]
    while q < N:
        if A[p] - A[q] >= M / 2:
            out = A[p] + A[p]
            break
        elif A[p] - A[q] == 0:
            q += 1
        else:
            out = A[p] + A[q] + (M - A[p] + A[q])
            break
    print(out)
for i in range(T):
    algo()

    ma = 0

    for i in range(0, n):
        ma = max(ma, m + l1[i] + (l1[i] - m) % M)
    print(ma)

    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    s1 = arr[0] + arr[0]
    c = 0
    for i in range(0, len(arr) - 1):
        rem2 = (arr[i + 1] - arr[i]) % m
        rem1 = (arr[i] - arr[i + 1]) % m
        if rem1 > rem2:
            rem = rem1
        else:
            rem = rem2
        ans = arr[i] + arr[i + 1] + rem
        if ans > s1:
            s1 = ans
    print(s1)
    t -= 1

import itertools
t = int(input())

    (N, M) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort(reverse=True)
    aj = l[0]

        u = aj + i + (i - aj) % M

            max1 = u
    print(max1)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, m) = input().split()
    n = int(n)
    m = int(m)
    a = list(map(int, input().split()[:n]))
    b = max(a)
    v = []
    for i in range(n):
        c = a[i] + b + (a[i] - b) % m
        v.append(c)
    print(max(v))
    t -= 1

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = max(a)
    b = 0
    for j in range(n):
        temp = c + a[j] + (a[j] - c) % m
        b = max(b, temp)
    print(b)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    lis = list(map(int, input().split()))
    maximum = max(lis)
    ans = 0
    for j in lis:
        c = maximum + j + max((maximum - j) % m, (j - maximum) % m)
        if c > ans:
            ans = c
    print(ans)
